summary: Provides the web request handling layer for dataset (package) operations in CKAN, implementing views for creating, editing, deleting, and managing collaborators and group associations, along with assorted helper utilities for URL handling, pagination, and template preparation.
business_intent: To expose a user‑facing interface that lets administrators and contributors manage dataset records—adding new datasets, updating existing ones, removing them, and configuring related collaborators and groups—while supporting navigation and search features within the CKAN portal.
